ing: 1/4 cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and chopped
des: "This is so easy to make and so good. It can be served with fresh vegetables, any type of cracker, or, my personal favorite, pita chips."
ins: In a food processor, mix the sun-dried tomatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper. Process until well-blended. Add basil, and continue processing until smooth. Chill at least 1 hour in the refrigerator before serving.
